name: Walrein
author: Midori Harada
flavor_text: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

poke_power.name: Freeze-up
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Walrein from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may flip 2 coins. If both are heads, discard 1 of the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it. (This doesn’t count as a Knocked Out Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Ice Bind
attacks.effect: If your opponent doesn’t discard a card from his or her hand, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
